question: My work which, is not a hospital, had a sharps container in the bathroom. After urinating I turned around and my elbow ran into the container. It wasn't the typical rectangular one it was more milk jug shaped with a wide open mouth you could look into. I wanted to check if there was anything to worry about. I examined my elbow and didn't notice or feel any stick. I do have rough elbows and I had a bug bite which started bleeding after I washed it.  Like i said I didn't see any open wound, but later in the day I was picking at my elbow and it did bleed slightly possible scab..   Looking in the box I didn't see any needles. There were razor blades and some small what I assume we're diabetes lancets.Should I be worried at all. Was it a bad idea to look in the container with out touching. I didn't see any blood I am just worried sick.  This is like an 8 on my things I would want to avoid :(
title: bumped into sharps container.
